TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsFormsHost extends System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost implements class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink
Public Class WindowsFormsHost Inherits HwndHost Implements IKeyboardInputSink
type WindowsFormsHost = class inherit HwndHost interface IKeyboardInputSink
.class public auto ansi WindowsFormsHost extends System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost implements class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: 一个元素，它允许在 WPF 页上托管 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 元素将 Windows 窗体控件置于 WPF 元素或页面内。Use the element to place a Windows Forms control within your WPF element or page. 若要在 Windows 窗体控件或窗体中承载 WPF 元素，请使用 控件。To host a WPF element in a Windows Forms control or form, use the control. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration 与 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 程序集一起安装。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 程序集的默认位置是%programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 若要在 WPF 元素中承载 Windows 窗体控件，必须将 Windows 窗体控件分配给 属性。To host a Windows Forms control in a WPF element, you must assign the Windows Forms control to the property. 使用 属性可在 元素与其托管 Windows 窗体控件之间分配自定义映射。Use the property to assign custom mappings between a element and its hosted Windows Forms control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping). ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 元素来承载 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a element to host a control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：使用 XAML 在 WPF 中承载 Windows 窗体控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml). [!code-xaml[HostingWfInWpfWithXaml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWfInWpfWithXaml/CSharp/HostingWfInWpf/Window1.xaml#1)]

A set to the background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性由 字段标识。This dependency property is identified by the field. 默认情况下，此属性将映射为更新所承载控件的 和 属性。By default, this property is mapped to update the and properties of the hosted control. 有关映射 属性的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information on mapping the property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *画笔**Brush* 请参阅 for XAML 特性语法。See for XAML Attribute syntax. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、, |

summary.span: 重写 的基类实现以生成托管的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: Overrides the base class implementation of to build the hosted Windows Forms control.
The window handle for this object.

member this.Child : System.Windows.Forms.Control with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 元素承载的子控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the element.

value.span: 承载 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: The hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能承载一个子控件，但 可以有任意数量的子控件。Only one child control can be hosted, but can have any number of children. 子控件不能是顶级窗体。The child control cannot be a top-level form. 如果 是 ，则窗体的 属性设置为 `false`。If is a , the form's property is set to `false`. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage `<`*对象*`>``<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl*`.../>``<` *hostedControl* `.../>` ```` ## XAML 值XAML Values 对象*object* 一个 元素（或一个可能的子类）。A element (or a possible subclass). *hostedControl**hostedControl* 指定承载 Windows 窗体控件的元素。An element that specifies the hosted Windows Forms control. 在标记中指定自定义控件通常需要 xmlns 映射，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性将托管控件添加到 元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to add the hosted control to the element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：在 WPF 中承载 ActiveX 控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf). [!code-csharp[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/CSharp/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/VisualBasic/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.vb#11)]

exception.span: 尝试将顶级窗体指定为要承载的控件。

summary.span: 使 在从 WPF 中以无模式方式打开时能正确运行。

span.span: Enables a to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from WPF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法，以便在 modelessly 打开 时转发所有键盘消息。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a is opened modelessly. 方法安装无模式窗体在由 WPF 打开时正常运行所必需的消息筛选器。The method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by WPF. 对于特定的 实例，只需调用一次此方法。You need to call this method only once for a particular instance.

summary.span: 获取或设置托管控件的字体系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted control's font family.

value.span: 托管控件中使用的字体系列。

span.span: The font family used in the hosted control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置仅影响其模板使用属性作为参数的控件。This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter. 它不会对其他控件产生任何影响。It has no effect on other controls. 此依赖项属性由 字段标识。This dependency property is identified by the field. 默认情况下，此属性将映射为更新所承载控件的 属性。By default, this property is mapped to update the property of the hosted control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *fontFamily**fontFamily* 请参阅 for XAML 特性语法。See for XAML Attribute syntax. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、、, , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性由 字段标识。This dependency property is identified by the field. 默认情况下，此属性将映射为更新所承载控件的 属性。By default, this property is mapped to update the property of the hosted control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式等于或大于0.0，但小于 。String representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0, but smaller than . 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，值1是可接受的。For instance a value of 1 is acceptable. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、、, , |

Protected Overrides Function MeasureOverride (constraint As Size) As Size

span.span: The available size for the object.

summary.span: 重写 的基类实现以度量 对象的大小并将正确的大小返回给布局引擎。

span.span: Overrides the base class implementation of to measure the size of a object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
The desired size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 布局中的大小约束是硬性限制。Size constraints in WPF layout are hard constraints. 如果超出了约束，则宿主必须在托管区域内剪裁内容。If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region. 此方法的实现强制执行此行为。The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果祖先元素的属性已更改，但 元素的本地值尚未更改，则可能需要调用 方法。Calling the method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the element has not changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取属性映射，该属性映射决定了设置 元素的属性会对托管的 Windows 窗体控件产生何种影响。

span.span: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the element affects the hosted Windows Forms control.

value.span: ，它将 属性映射到寄宿 Windows 窗体控件上的属性。

span.span: A that maps properties to properties on the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体和 WPF 技术有两个类似但不同的属性模型。The Windows Forms and WPF technologies have two similar but different property models. *属性映射*支持两种体系结构之间的互操作。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体和 WPF 属性映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性的映射添加到 控件。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to a control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.vb#12)]

span.span: The new scale factor.

summary.span: 缩放托管的 Windows 窗体控件并跟踪比例因子。

span.span: Scales the hosted Windows Forms control, and tracks the scale factor.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示应用于托管的 Windows 窗体控件的比例因子。

span.span: A which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体控件不支持按与 WPF 元素相同的方式进行缩放。Windows Forms controls do not support scaling in the same way as WPF elements. 例如，将 Windows 窗体控件从1到系数为0.5，然后再将其缩放为1，通常不会恢复控件的原始大小。For example, scaling a Windows Forms control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WindowsFormsHost 元素的布局注意事项](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element)。For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element). 重写 方法，以便为承载的 Windows 窗体控件提供自定义缩放行为。Override the method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted Windows Forms control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TabIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置托管控件的选项卡索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.

value.span: 用于选项卡导航和焦点的选项卡索引。

span.span: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性由 字段标识。This dependency property is identified by the field. 使用此属性可更改窗体上的控件之间的选项卡导航的顺序。Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form. 带有较低选项卡索引的控件将在具有更高索引的控件之前获得焦点。A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 将焦点从 WPF 转移到托管的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: Forwards focus from WPF to the hosted Windows Forms control.

returns.span: 如果控件已激活，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a control was activated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 元素从 方法接收选项卡命令时， 中第一个符合条件的控件将接收焦点。When a element receives a TAB command from the method, the first eligible control in receives focus. 第一个控件由 `request` 参数指定。The first control is specified by the `request` parameter. `request` 时，行为类似于按 TAB 键。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key. `request` 时，行为类似于按 SHIFT + TAB。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
